LanguageData.WoW_Draenei.label: Draenei
LanguageData.WoW_Draenei.description: The draenei (meaning Exiled Ones in their own tongue) are a faction of uncorrupted eredar who fled their homeworld of Argus to escape the corruption of the demonic Burning Legion.
